spell_tooltip.description:
Summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec.

Whenever enemies within 23 yards of the totem deal direct damage, the totem will deal 100% of the damage dealt back to attacker.

Burrow beneath the ground, becoming unattackable, removing movement impairing effects, and increasing your movement speed by 50% for 5 sec.

When the effect ends, enemies within 6 yards are knocked in the air and take 445,843 Physical damage.
Summons a totem with 4% of your health at the target location for 6 sec that forms a circuit of electricity that enemies cannot pass through.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 141,192 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 72,130 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 72,713 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 74,430 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 118,303 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
Ghost Wolf removes snares and increases your movement speed by an additional 25% for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 20 sec.
Chills the target with frost, causing 83,841 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

Increases the movement speed bonus of Ghost Wolf by 10%.

When you have 3 or more totems active, your movement speed is increased by 15%.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Cleanse Spirit, Wind Shear, Purge, and totem casts no longer cancel Ghost Wolf.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 9 yards for 3 sec.
Removes all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Summons a totem at the target location for 30 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, rooting all enemies within 9 yards for 8 sec. Enemies previously rooted by the totem instead suffer 50% movement speed reduction.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
Summons a totem at your feet that shakes the ground around it for 13 sec, removing Fear, Charm and Sleep effects from party and raid members within 34 yards.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 11 yards 40% increased movement speed for 7 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 10,417 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Wind Rush Totem's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec and its movement speed effect lasts an additional 2 sec.
The effects of your weapon imbues are increased by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 2.4 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 243,235 every 5 sec for 30 sec.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Imbue your main-hand weapon with the element of Wind for 1 hour. Each main-hand attack has a 33% chance to trigger three extra attacks, dealing 21,734 Physical damage each.

Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.

Charges your off-hand weapon with lava and burns your target, dealing 139,951 Fire damage.

Damage is increased by 100% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon.
Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Windfury Weapon has a 100% chance to trigger a third attack.

Whenever you spend Maelstrom Weapon, your Frost Shock has a chance to become Ice Strike.

Ice Strike
Strike your target with an icy blade, dealing 360,398 Frost damage and snaring them by 50% for 6 sec.

Ice Strike increases the damage of your next Frost Shock by 100% and generates 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.

This ability has a 40 yard range.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.
Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash have a 100% chance to discharge electricity at your target, dealing 49,428 Nature damage.

Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon consumed increases the damage of your next Frost Shock by 15%, and causes your next Frost Shock to hit 1 additional target per Maelstrom Weapon stack consumed, up to 5.

Consuming at least 2 stacks of Hailstorm generates 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Your damage or healing spells will now consume up to 10 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.
Shatters a line of earth in front of you with your main hand weapon, causing 271,571 Flamestrike damage and Incapacitating any enemy hit for 2 sec.
Increase the chance for Mastery: Enhanced Elements to trigger Windfury and Stormsurge by 150%.
Consuming at least 2 stacks of Hailstorm, and each explosion from Fire Nova now also grants you 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing 171,125 Nature damage. Hitting 2 or more targets enhances your weapons for 12 sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal 51,287 Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 6 targets.

Each target hit by Crash Lightning increases the damage of your next Stormstrike by 25%, up to a maximum of 6 stacks.
Stormstrike has a 25% chance to strike the target an additional time for 40% of normal damage. This effect can chain off of itself.

Stormstrike has an additional charge.

Stormsurge now also causes your next Stormstrike to deal 25% additional damage as Nature damage, stacking up to 2 times.

Tempest, Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning have a high chance to make your next Flame Shock become Voltaic Blaze.

Voltaic Blaze
Instantly shocks the target and 5 nearby enemies with blazing thunder, causing 491,510 Nature damage and applying Flame Shock.

Generates 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.
Each target hit by Crash Lightning increases the damage of your next Stormstrike by 25%, up to a maximum of 6 stacks.

Crash Lightning damage increased by 40%.

Chain Lightning now jumps to 2 extra targets.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 635,015 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.

Transform into an Air Ascendant for 15 sec, immediately dealing 265,535 Nature damage to any enemy within 8 yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by 60%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a 30 yd range.

While Ascendance is active, generate 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks every 1 sec.
Primordial Wave grants you 5% Haste plus 2% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Stormstrike damage is increased by 20%, and Stormstrike, Lava Lash, and Ice Strike have a 100% chance to generate 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.

20% chance to refund Maelstrom Weapon stacks spent on Lightning Bolt, Tempest, or Chain Lightning.

While Ascendance is active, generate 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks every 1 sec.

Increases the damage of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 20%, and reduces the cooldown of Ascendance by 60 sec.

While Ascendance is active, Windstrike automatically consumes up to 5 Maelstrom Weapon stacks to discharge a Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning at 100% effectiveness at your enemy, whichever you most recently used.
Every 40 Maelstrom Weapon stacks spent replaces your next Lightning Bolt with Tempest.

Spending Maelstrom Weapon stacks grants you 1% haste for 15 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature damage spells by 5% and the critical strike damage of your Nature spells by 10%.
Tempest increases your movement speed by 20% for 5 sec.
Lightning Bolt, Tempest, and Chain Lightning have a 35% chance to refund 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.

Tempest causes your next Chain Lightning or Lightning Bolt to be instant cast, deal 40% increased damage, and cast an additional time.

Can accumulate up to 2 charges.
Tempest summons a Nature Feral Spirit for 15 sec.
Crash Lightning and Chain Lightning damage increased by 10%.

Gain the effects of the Lightning Rod talent:

 Lightning Rod
Tempest, Lightning Bolt, Elemental Blast, Primordial Wave and Chain Lightning make your target a Lightning Rod for 8 sec.
 
Lightning Rods take 8% of all damage you deal with Tempest, Lightning Bolt, and Chain Lightning.
Lightning Shield reduces the damage you take by 3%.
Stormstrike, Lightning Bolt, and Chain Lightning have a chance to strike your target for 251,593 Nature damage. Every 4 times this occurs, your next Lightning Bolt is replaced by Tempest.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 141,490 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 72,941 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 72,311 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

When Capacitor Totem fades or is destroyed, another Capacitor Totem is automatically dropped in the same place.

Transforms the enemy into a frog for 1 min. While hexed, the victim is incapacitated, and cannot attack or cast spells. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1. Only works on Humanoids and Beasts.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 10,214 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Grips the target in lightning, stunning and dealing 851,197 Nature damage over 5 sec while the target is lassoed. Can move while channeling.

Your Stormstrike casts restore 2,625 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.

Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.
Thunderstorm now can be cast on allies within 40 yards, reduces enemies movement speed by 60%, and knocks enemies 25% further.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 2.4 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 243,235 every 5 sec for 30 sec.

Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Lava Lash cooldown reduced by 6.0 sec, and if Lava Lash is used against a target affected by your Flame Shock, Flame Shock will be spread to up to 5 nearby enemies.
Windfury Weapon has a 100% chance to trigger a third attack.

Whenever you spend Maelstrom Weapon, your Frost Shock has a chance to become Ice Strike.

Ice Strike
Strike your target with an icy blade, dealing 356,874 Frost damage and snaring them by 50% for 6 sec.

Ice Strike increases the damage of your next Frost Shock by 100% and generates 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.

This ability has a 40 yard range.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.
Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash have a 100% chance to discharge electricity at your target, dealing 49,428 Nature damage.

Unleash a devastating storm around yourself, dealing 91,795 Stormstrike damage every 1 sec to nearby enemies for 8 sec.

Increases your chance to activate Windfury Weapon by 200%, and the damage of Windfury Weapon by 10%.

Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon consumed increases the damage of your next Frost Shock by 15%, and causes your next Frost Shock to hit 1 additional target per Maelstrom Weapon stack consumed, up to 5.

Consuming at least 2 stacks of Hailstorm generates 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Your damage or healing spells will now consume up to 10 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.
Increase the chance for Mastery: Enhanced Elements to trigger Windfury and Stormsurge by 150%.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing 166,102 Nature damage. Hitting 2 or more targets enhances your weapons for 12 sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal 50,781 Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 6 targets.

Each target hit by Crash Lightning increases the damage of your next Stormstrike by 25%, up to a maximum of 6 stacks.

Stormstrike has an additional charge.

Stormsurge now also causes your next Stormstrike to deal 25% additional damage as Nature damage, stacking up to 2 times.

Tempest, Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning have a high chance to make your next Flame Shock become Voltaic Blaze.

Voltaic Blaze
Instantly shocks the target and 5 nearby enemies with blazing thunder, causing 492,812 Nature damage and applying Flame Shock.

Generates 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.
When Crash Lightning hits only 1 target, it activates Windfury Weapon and its cooldown is reduced by 40%.

Crash Lightning damage increased by 40%.

Chain Lightning now jumps to 2 extra targets.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 637,402 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.

Transform into an Air Ascendant for 15 sec, immediately dealing 265,547 Nature damage to any enemy within 8 yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by 60%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a 30 yd range.

While Ascendance is active, generate 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks every 1 sec.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Stormstrike damage is increased by 20%, and Stormstrike, Lava Lash, and Ice Strike have a 100% chance to generate 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.

20% chance to refund Maelstrom Weapon stacks spent on Lightning Bolt, Tempest, or Chain Lightning.

While Ascendance is active, generate 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks every 1 sec.

Primordial Wave transforms into a single use Primordial Storm for 15 sec after it is cast.

Primordial Storm
Devastate nearby enemies with a Primordial Storm dealing 110,034 Flamestrike, 109,504 Froststrike, 110,252 Stormstrike damage, and unleashing a Lightning Bolt or a Chain Lightning at 150% effectiveness. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased damage.

Increases the damage of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 20%, and reduces the cooldown of Ascendance by 60 sec.

While Ascendance is active, Windstrike automatically consumes up to 5 Maelstrom Weapon stacks to discharge a Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning at 100% effectiveness at your enemy, whichever you most recently used.

Spending Maelstrom Weapon stacks grants you 1% haste for 15 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature damage spells by 5% and the critical strike damage of your Nature spells by 10%.

You have a chance to get struck by lightning, increasing your movement speed by 50% for 5 sec. The effectiveness is increased to 100% in outdoor areas.

You call down a Thunderstorm when you Reincarnate.
Lightning Bolt, Tempest, and Chain Lightning have a 35% chance to refund 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.

Tempest causes your next Chain Lightning or Lightning Bolt to be instant cast, deal 40% increased damage, and cast an additional time.

Can accumulate up to 2 charges.
Tempest summons a Nature Feral Spirit for 15 sec.
Crash Lightning and Chain Lightning damage increased by 10%.

Gain the effects of the Lightning Rod talent:

 Lightning Rod
Tempest, Lightning Bolt, Elemental Blast, Primordial Wave and Chain Lightning make your target a Lightning Rod for 8 sec.
 
Lightning Rods take 8% of all damage you deal with Tempest, Lightning Bolt, and Chain Lightning.
When you cast Tempest you gain Surging Currents, increasing the effectiveness of your next Chain Heal or Healing Surge by 20%, up to 100%.
Stormstrike, Lightning Bolt, and Chain Lightning have a chance to strike your target for 256,348 Nature damage. Every 4 times this occurs, your next Lightning Bolt is replaced by Tempest.
Heals the friendly target for 192,893, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 191,204, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 194,120, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 138,679 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 139,108 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 140,451 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 72,248 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 118,873 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
While transformed into a Ghost Wolf, you gain 5% increased movement speed and 5% damage reduction every 1 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Increases the movement speed bonus of Ghost Wolf by 10%.

When you have 3 or more totems active, your movement speed is increased by 15%.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Cleanse Spirit, Wind Shear, Purge, and totem casts no longer cancel Ghost Wolf.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 9 yards for 3 sec.
Removes all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.
Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.
Purify Spirit additionally removes all Curse effects.
Summons a totem at your feet that shakes the ground around it for 13 sec, removing Fear, Charm and Sleep effects from party and raid members within 34 yards.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 11 yards 40% increased movement speed for 7 sec.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 10,226 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Wind Rush Totem's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec and its movement speed effect lasts an additional 2 sec.
The effects of your weapon imbues are increased by 15%.
Grips the target in lightning, stunning and dealing 851,197 Nature damage over 5 sec while the target is lassoed. Can move while channeling.

Your Stormstrike casts restore 2,625 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.

Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.
Thunderstorm now can be cast on allies within 40 yards, reduces enemies movement speed by 60%, and knocks enemies 25% further.
Summons a totem at your feet that removes all Poison effects from a nearby party or raid member within 34 yards every 1.5 sec for 9 sec.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 2.4 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 243,235 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 178,667 and an additional 110,449 over 18 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 168,494 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal heal for an additional 15% on targets affected by your Healing Rain or Riptide.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.6 sec, healing all party or raid members within 46 yards for 120300.9.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Healing Rain instantly restores 34,776 health to 5 allies within its area, and its radius is increased by 2 yards.
Targets you heal with Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Chain Heal, or Riptide's initial heal gain 5% increased health for 10 sec.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 11 yards by 10%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.

Casting Lava Burst increases the healing of your next Healing Surge by 30%, stacking up to 2 times.

Healing Surge applies Flame Shock to a nearby enemy when empowered by Master of the Elements.
Healing Stream Totem heals for 100% more, decaying over its duration.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
Reduces the cooldown of Healing Tide Totem by 45 sec.
Spirit Link Totem reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, and it restores 526,909 health to all nearby allies 1 second after it is dropped. Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Healing Tide Totem now additionally grants 80% increased mana regeneration to allies.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and casting Chain Heal on a target affected by Riptide consumes Riptide, increasing the healing of your Chain Heal by 30%.
Every third Healing Wave or Healing Surge heals for an additional 50%.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.

Summons a totem at the target location for 33 sec. All allies within 23 yards of the totem gain 10% increased health. If an ally dies, the totem will be consumed to allow them to Reincarnate with 20% health and mana.

Cannot reincarnate an ally who dies to massive damage.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for 94,866 over 6 sec.

Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 586,062. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Every 10 sec, the cast time of your next Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and jump distance increased by 100%. Maximum of 2 charges.
Earth Shield reduces damage taken by 3% and its healing is increased by up to 150% as its target's health decreases. Maximum benefit is reached below 50% health.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.
Increases Riptide's duration by 6.0 sec and its healing over time by 20%.

Earthliving receives 150% additional benefit from Mastery: Deep Healing.

Healing Surge always triggers Earthliving on its target.
Every 1 million mana you spend brings a High Tide, making your next 2 Chain Heals heal for an additional 10% and not reduce with each jump.

Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Elemental Blast has a chance to unleash a Surging Bolt at your Surging Totem, increasing the totem's damage by 10%, and then redirecting the bolt to your target for 112,979 Nature damage. The damage bonus effect can stack.
While Surging Totem is active, your damage and healing done is increased by 3%.

Lava Lash has a chance to summon a Searing Totem to hurl Searing Bolts that deal 60,761 Fire damage to a nearby enemy. Lasts 8 sec.

Frost Shocks empowered by Hailstorm, Lava Lash, and Fire Nova cause your Searing totems to shoot a Searing Volley at up to 5 nearby enemies for 119,041 Fire damage.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 521,023 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

While Hot Hand is active Lash Lava shatters the earth, causing a Sundering at 50% effectiveness.

Sunderings from this effect do not Incapacitate.

Increases the chance for Windfury Weapon to trigger by 5% and increases its damage by 8%.

When Flametongue Weapon triggers from Windfury Weapon attacks, it has a chance to gather a whirl of flame around the target, dealing 300% of its damage to all nearby enemies.
Increases the damage of Surging Totem by 18%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Searing Totem's attacks by 15%, and its critical strike damage by 30%.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects. 

Air: Your next Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning or Elemental Blast unleashes 3 Surging Bolts at your Surging Totem.

Earth: Direct damage of your next Flame Shock is increased by 300% and it is applied to 5 nearby enemies.

Fire: Your next Lava Lash or Fire Nova grants you Hot Hand for 6 sec.
